report.title: Recent Observations in Survey
report.description: Lists the most recent recordings in a specified survey.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM cache_occurrences o LEFT JOIN occurrence_images oi ON oi.occurrence_id=o.id WHERE o.record_status NOT IN ('I','T') #order_by#
report.field_sql: o.survey_title as title, o.website_id, o.id as occurrence_id, o.date_start, o.date_end, o.date_type, o.taxon, o.public_entered_sref as entered_sref, o.location_name, oi.path, CASE o.record_status WHEN 'C' THEN 'Data Entry Complete' WHEN 'V' THEN 'Verified' WHEN 'R' THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 'I' THEN 'In Progress' WHEN 'T' THEN 'Test' WHEN 'S' THEN 'Sent for verification' ELSE '' END AS record_status, o.verifier as verified_by

param.name: survey
param.description: Select the survey to return data for
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys
